resources.string:
The object of the game is to get a consecutive four in a row of you connect! The connects can be vertical, horizontal, or diagonal! 

 Take turns placing the your assigned colored connect (green or white) in a desired column by dragging the connect to that column. 

 If you change you mind, click the undo button, and try again. Once you have made your final decision click the done button to switch off players. 

 If you no longer want to play the game, you can click the forfeit button on your turn, resulting in your lose and win for the opposite player.
